special_text:
Enchantments you control have hexproof.
[+2]: Target creature you control gains vigilance and can't be blocked until end of turn.
[-1]: Target creature phases out until The Ephemeral Piper leaves the battlefield.
[-4]: Create a colorless enchantment token named Ringing Noise with “At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, for each creature they control, destroy that creature unless its controller pays {1}.”
